slides.paragraph: Our #Reach365 video campaign is a living case study on our differentiators. This is for the dreamers, the entrepreneurs, the innovators. If that's you, catch up with the campaign.

data.heading: We have the right adveristing solution for every situation

articles.paragraph: If you’re still relying solely on your gross rating point (GRP) and your customer relationship management (CRM) to measure television and digital campaigns, you’re not getting the full story.
articles.subHeading: What’s the REAL Return on Investment for Your Marketing Plan?
articles.heading: How Do You Know if Your Advertising Campaign is Working?

articles.paragraph: Our solutions come from our unparalleled data. Our compelling creative content. Our local expertise. That’s why we’re the Marketing Platform of Choice.
articles.subHeading: This is for the dreamers, the entrepreneurs, the innovators.
articles.heading: #Reach365: Small, Small Business

image.alt: Spectrum Reach Los Angeles Adlink Upfront

articles.paragraph: Los Angeles’ most influential media buyers and industry experts joined Spectrum Reach leadership at one of our first Upfronts of the season in Hollywood, California.
articles.heading: Television, reInvented

articles.paragraph: TV is still the ultimate brand-builder. In any given minute, an average of 50,349,713 viewers 18+ are watching their favorite content on TV across the US
articles.subHeading: Ad-Supported live TV sparks social engagement
articles.heading: TV is Social

image.alt: Television is Still Strong for Advertisers

articles.paragraph: Media sales organizations need to move beyond the elite. Television advertising is attainable for businesses of any size.  Television remains the best way to build brands and reach customers.
articles.subHeading: Television is Still Strong for Advertisers
articles.heading: TV Advertising Isn’t Just for the Elite

articles.paragraph: Cable’s innovative and diverse programming continues to gain critical-acclaim with a historic win at this year’s Primetime Emmy Awards. It’s the Golden Age of TV – and cable continues to deliver buzzworthy (and award-winning) audience-favorites.
articles.subHeading: 2017 Emmys award and nominate dozens of the best shows on TV
articles.heading: A Historic Win and Critical-Acclaim for Cable Programming

data.heading: Tv Everywhere continues to grow
data.paragraph: Live and on-demand viewership across screens continues to grow as consumers replicate the tv experience in the new living room.
